sn55.47:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nandiyaṃ sakkaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.47:1.3: “catūhi kho, nandiya, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.47:2.2: Idha, nandiya, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.47:2.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.47:2.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.47:2.7: Imehi kho, nandiya, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
